body.div:
BLANK
BLANK
namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
evam me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati sūbhagavane sālarājamūle
tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhu āmantesi bhikkhavo ti bhadante ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosum bhagavā etadavoca sabbadhammamūlapariyā-
yaṃ vo bhikkhave desissāmi taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmī ti evam bhante ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato pacca-
ssosum bhagavā etadavoca
idha bhikkhave assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāṃvīssā ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme
avinīto sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinīto paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito sañjānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito sañña-
tvā paṭhaviṃ maṃñati paṭhaviyā maṃñati paṭhavito maṃñati paṭhavimmeti maṃñati paṭhaviṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
āpaṃ āpato sañjānāti āpaṃ āpato saṃñatvā āpaṃ maṃñati āpasmiṃ mañati āpato maṃñati āpammeti maṃñati āpaṃ abhinanda-
ti taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi tejaṃ tejejato saṃ?ñjājānāti tejaṃ tejato saṃñatvā tejaṃ maṃñati tejasmiṃ mañña-
ti tejato maṃñati tejammeti maṃñati tejaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vāyaṃ vāyato saṃ?ñjājānāti vāyaṃ vāyato saṃñatvā vāyaṃ maṃñati vāyasmiṃ maṃñati vāyato maṃñati vāyammeti maṃñati vāyaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
bhūte bhūtato sañjānāti bhūte bhūtato saṃñatvā bhūte maṃñati bhutesu maṃñati bhūtato maṃ-
ñati bhūte meti maṃñati bhute abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vede vedevato sañjānāti deve devato saṃñatvā deve maṃñati devesu maṃñati devato maṃñati deve meti maṃñati deve meti abhinandati taṃ kissa hetū apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito saṃjānāti pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito saṃñatvā pajāpatiṃ maññati pajāpatismiṃ maṃ-
ñati pajāpatito maṃñati pajāpatimmeti maññati pajāpatiṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi brahmaṃ bramhmahmato saṃjānāti brahmaṃ brahmato saṃñatvā brahmaṃ maṃñati brahmaṃti maṃñati brahmato maṃñati brahma meti maṃñati brahmaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ābhassare ābhassarato saṃjānāti ābhassare ābhassarato saṃñatvā ābhassare maṃñati ābhassaresu maṃñati ābhassarato maṃñati ābhassare meti maṃñati ābhassare abhinandati taṃ kissa hetū apariṃñātiṃtaṃ tassā ti vadāmi subhakiṇṇaṃ subhakiṇhato sañjānāti subhakiṇhesu subhakiṇha-
to saṃñatvā subhakiṇhe maṃñati subhakiṇhesu maṃñati subhakiṇhato maṃñati subhakiṇha meti maṃñati subhakiṇhe abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vehapphale vehapphalato sañjānāti vehapphale vehapphalato saṃñatvā vehapphale maṃñati vehapphalesū
maṃñati vehapphalato maṃñati vehapphale meti maṃñati vehapphale abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi abhibhuṃ abhibhūto sañjānāti abhibhuṃ abhibhūto saṃñatvā abhibhuṃ maṃñati abhibhusmiṃ maṃñati abhibhuto maṃñati abhibhummeti maṃñati abhibhuṃ abhinandati taṃ
kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato sañjānāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ vāya ākāsānañcāyatanasetāto saṃñatvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanato maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ meti maṃñati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñā-
taṃ tassā ti vadāmi viṃñānañcāyatanaṃ viññānañcāyatanato sañjānāti viññānañcāyatanaṃ viññānañcāyatanato saṃñatvā viṃñānañcāyatanaṃ maṃñati viṃñāṇañcāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati viṃñānañcāyatanato maṃñati viññānañcāyatanammeti maṃñati viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetū apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ā-
kiṃcaṃñāyatanaṃ ākiṃñāyatanato saṃjānāti ākiṃcaññāyatanaṃ ākiṃcaññāyatanaṃākiṃcaññāyatanato saṃñatvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ maṃñati ākiñcaññāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati ākiñcaññāyatanato maṃñati ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato sañjā
nāti nevasaññanāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato saṃñatvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ maṃñati nevasaṃñānāsaññāyatanasmiṃ maṃñati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato maṃñati nevasaññānāsaṃñāyatanam meti maññati nevasaṃñānāsaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato sañjā
nāti diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato saṃñatvā diṭṭhaṃ maṃñati diṭṭhasmiṃ maṃñati diṭṭhato maṃñati diṭṭhaṃ meti maññati diṭṭhaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sutaṃ sutato saṃjānāti sutaṃ sutato saṃñatvā sutaṃ maṃññati sutasmiṃ maṃñati sutato maṃñati sūtammeti maṃñati sutaṃ
abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi mutaṃ mutato saṃjānāti mutaṃ mutato saṃñatvā mutaṃ maṃñati mutasmiṃ maṃñati mutato maṃñati mutammeti maṃñati mutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viṃñātaṃ viṃñātato sañjānāti
viṃñātaṃ viṃñātato saṃñatvā viṃñātaṃ maṃñati viṃñātasmiṃ maṃñati viṃñātato maṃñati viṃñātammeti maṃñati viṃñātaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ekattaṃ ekattato saṃjānāti ekattaṃ ekattato saṃñatvā ekatta maṃñati ekattasmiṃ
maṃñati ekattato maṃñati ekattammeti maṃñati ekattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nānattaṃ nānattato saṃjānāti nānattaṃ nānattato saṃñatvā nānānattaṃ maṃñati nānattasmiṃ maṃñāti nānattato maṃñati nānattammeti maṃña
ti nānattaṃ abhinandatoti taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sabbaṃ sabbato saṃjānāti sabbaṃ sabbato saṃñatvā sabbaṃ maṃñati sabbasmiṃ maññati sabbato maṃñati sabbammeti maṃñati sabbaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānatito saṃñatvā nibbānaṃ maññati nibbā
nasmiṃ maṃñati nibbānato maṃñati nibbānammeti maṃñati nibbānaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi assutavanta puthujjanābhavaseti paṭhamakabhūmiparicchedo
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu sekho appattamānaso anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno viharati sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhi
jānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ vā maṃñati paṭhavitoyā vā maṃñati paṭhavito vā maṃñati paṭhaviṃvimā abhinandatim meti vā maṃñati paṭhaviṃ vāabhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññeyyaṃ tassā vadāmi ...pe... āpaṃ tejaṃ vā vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ
ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhūṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viṃñāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaṃñānāsaṃñāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viṃñātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ
nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ vā maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ vā maṃñi nibbānato vā maññi nibbānam meti vā maṃñi nibbānaṃ vāabhinandati taṃ kissa hetu avipariṃñeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sekhāvahavivaṭṭaddhavaseti dutiyakaṃbhūmiparicchedo
yopi so bhikkhave
bhikkhu aharahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojaniyo sammadaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhināti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ maññati paṭhaviyā maṃñati paṭhavim meti na maññati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariṃñātaṃ tassā ti
vadāmi āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānam meti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariṃñātiṃtaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
khīṇāsavāha paṭhamakataye tatiyakabhūmiparicchedi
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya
paṭhaviṃ maṃñati paṭhaviyā na maṃñati paṭhavito na maṃñati paṭhavim meti na maññati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānam meti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ
nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā khīṇāsavāha dutiyakanaye cattārivānakabhumiparicchedi
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇābhavasaṃyojano sammadaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ pha
paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhavitoṃviṃ na maṃñati paṭhaviyā na maṃñati paṭhavito maṃñati paṭhavimmeti na maṃñati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosatta vītadosattā āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāyaṃ nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbāna
mmeti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vītadosattā khīṇāsvāha tatiyakanaye pañcavānabhumiparicchedi
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavaṃ katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇābhavasaṃyojano sammadaṃñā vimutto sopi paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñā
ya paṭhaviṃ na maṃñati paṭhaviyā na maṃñati paṭhavito na maṃñati paṭhavimmeti na maṃñati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vītamohattā āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhinājānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ
na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānaṃm meti pajānāti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vītamohassattā khīṇāsavāha catutthakanayeca chaapānakabhumīparicchedi
tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho paṭhaviṃ pa
ṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ na maṃñati paṭhaviyā na maṃñati paṭhavito na maṃñati paṭhavimmeti na maṃñati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariṃñātaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato
abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānammeti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariṃñātaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi satthāharahapaṭhamakanasena sattaapānakabhūmiparicchedi
tathāgatopi bhikkhave a
rahaṃ sammāsambuddho paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhijānāti paṭhaviṃ paṭhavito abhiṃñāya paṭhaviṃ na maṃñati paṭhaviyā na maṃñati paṭhavito na maṃñati paṭhavim meti na maṃñati paṭhaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhutassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhāṇaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissajaggā anuttaraṃ
sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmi āpaṃ tejaṃ ...pe... nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiṃñāya nibbānaṃ na maṃñati nibbānasmiṃ na maṃñati nibbānato na maṃñati nibbānammeti na maṃñati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandī dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhutassa jarāmaraṇā
nti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmī ti satthāraha dutiyakanaye aṭṭhavānakabhūmiparicchedi idamavoca bhagavā te bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ
